alert.note: Alert for Far Northwest Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 28 at 9:26PM MST until December 29 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Wind gusts up to 35 mph will create poor visibility and areas of blowing, especially in the higher terrain. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially along U.S. Highway 64 and State Road 537. Some roads may be closed and significant travel delays are possible. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
